Class StreamProcessor<T>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.pipeline.StreamProcessor<T>
public class StreamProcessor<T> extends Object
Stream Processor for real-time data pipelines. Features: - Map/Filter/Reduce operations - Windowed aggregation - Backpressure handling - Parallel processing
